name: ifex-exif-viewer
title: Ifex Exif Viewer
description: View EXIF data from image files using the ifex CLI tool
author: danielfilho

commands.name: ifex
commands.title: View Exif Data
commands.description: View EXIF data from files selected in Finder

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` or \`ray publish\`.

" && exit 1
